dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What brings you here, Nyxara? These waters are not for the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm here to conquer this realm and its secrets.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conquer? You dare speak of conquest in my presence!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do. And you will either stand aside or fall before me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your downfall. Prepare to be tested by my blade.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us fight and see who emerges victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Let the battle commence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will instead harness your power for my cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You underestimate my strength. I refuse to be your pawn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps we can reach an agreement.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An agreement? What could you possibly offer me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Power beyond your imagination.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tempting, but I shall not betray my duties.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and the Serpentide will rule.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Serpentide do not bend to anyone's will. Least of all yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stand aside, serpent, or perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats amuse me. You have no idea who you are dealing with.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Nyxara, destined to bring darkness upon this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destined to fall by my hands, more like. Prepare yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for your insolence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Nor do I for your arrogance. Leave now and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and the power of ancient magics.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge comes with a price, dark one. Are you willing to pay it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Name your price, and we shall see.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My loyalty isn't for sale, nor is the knowledge you seek.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret denying me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I fear nothing, least of all your empty threats.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take it by force if I must.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then come. I will show you how futile your endeavor is.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm prepared to pay any cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Even your life? You overestimate your capabilities.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall do it alone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alone, you shall find only death. Leave while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your life ends here, serpent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You will taste the venom of my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will force it out of you if I must.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such audacity. You seal your fate with those words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no fear of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We shall see how long your bravery lasts in battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: There are other ways to make you talk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I have no interest in your games. Begone before I lose patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Spare me your bravado. I have no quarrel with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No quarrel? Then why do you darken my waters with your presence?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I simply pass through in search of my own path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Be quick about it. I have no tolerance for loitering.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will be on my way, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good. Do not let me see you again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I intend to stay.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish. Now you will face my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps our paths can align.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Align? Explain yourself before I lose patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can achieve greatness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Greatness requires trust, something you have yet to earn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and the rewards will be plentiful.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enticing. For now, I will consider your offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm not here for a fight, just passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: If you are truthful, then go quickly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Thank you. I will leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Be gone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, I have business here.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then your business ends now in combat.
